Message: previously with the trainings that my last coach gave me i got injured and today i just feel pain to walk so it will be very hard to run few kilometers

I'm sorry to hear about your past struggle with injuries, it's natural to have concerns. Let's focus on regaining confidence at a pace that feels right for you. We'll monitor progress closely, ensuring safety comes first. Together, we'll work towards a healthier, more enjoyable running
today i dont' want to train because it was a very though day but i need to encourage me because I am sure that after the training I will be much more happy than now

It's completely understandable to feel down sometimes, especially after a tough day. However, remember how empowering it can be to overcome challenges through exercise. Give yourself permission to start small, and let each step forward bring renewed positivity.
I don't want to traing because I am starving and I prefer eating and relax

Hunger is a basic need, and self-care is important too. Perhaps we could plan to train a little later when you've had a chance to refuel? In the meantime, let's visualize a successful session to keep motivation high.
